channel.title: IwYvI
channel.description: IwYvI的博客，分享心得和学习过程

item.title: wechat test
item.description:
文字摘要
~圣诞快乐~

今天是圣诞节，所以Monica为大家带来的曲子是 we wish you a merry christmas 。
这首曲子原曲由歌手Enya演唱，是经典的圣诞歌曲，也是每年圣诞节大街小巷都能听到的曲子。本是圣洁庄重的歌，被改编后变得活泼轻快，歌词也都是祝福的话语，给人幸福温馨的感觉。
这首满是祝福的歌在圣诞节的晚上送给爱樱之音的每一个人，Monica的话全在歌词里，祝愿大家幸福美满，平安喜乐，we wish you a merry christmas~


~圣诞快乐~

今天是圣诞节，所以Monica为大家带来的曲子是 we wish you a merry christmas 。
这首曲子原曲由歌手Enya演唱，是经典的圣诞歌曲，也是每年圣诞节大街小巷都能听到的曲子。本是圣洁庄重的歌，被改编后变得活泼轻快，歌词也都是祝福的话语，给人幸福温馨的感觉。
这首满是祝福的歌在圣诞节的晚上送给爱樱之音的每一个人，Monica的话全在歌词里，祝愿大家幸福美满，平安喜乐，we wish you a merry christmas~


~圣诞快乐~

今天是圣诞节，所以Monica为大家带来的曲子是 we wish you a merry christmas 。
这首曲子原曲由歌手Enya演唱，是经典的圣诞歌曲，也是每年圣诞节大街小巷都能听到的曲子。本是圣洁庄重的歌，被改编后变得活泼轻快，歌词也都是祝福的话语，给人幸福温馨的感觉。
这首满是祝福的歌在圣诞节的晚上送给爱樱之音的每一个人，Monica的话全在歌词里，祝愿大家幸福美满，平安喜乐，we wish you a merry christmas~

item.title: Test Markdown
item.description:
一级标题

二级标题

三级标题

这个

额额u
猪猪蜀黍转
  • 然后
  • 测试

  • 就是这样

  • Red
  • Green
  • Blue
  1. 没有
  2. 有
  3. 测试

引用就是这样的

jekyllrb.com

粗体和测试的斜体似乎犯了

single asterisks

single underscores

double asterisks

double underscores

There is a literal backtick (`) here.

Tables Are Cool
col 3 is right-aligned $1600
col 2 is centered $12
zebra stripes are neat $1

然后没有

This is an H1

This is an H2

这是一个标题。

  1. 这是第一行列表项。
  2. 这是第二行列表项。

给出一些例子代码：

文字之间的eegeh utehu这个

item.title: Two11
item.description:
a To add new posts, simply add a file in the _posts directory that follows the convention YYYY-MM-DD-name-of-post.ext and includes the necessary front matter. Take a look at the source for this post to get an idea about how it works.is post in your _posts directory. Go ahead and edit it and re-build the site to see your changes. You can rebuild the site in many different ways, but the most common way is to run jekyll serve, which launches a web server and auto-regenerates your site when a file is updated.

To add new posts, simply add a file in the _posts directory that follows the convention YYYY-MM-DD-name-of-post.ext and includes the necessary front matter. Take a look at the source for this post to get an idea about how it works.is post in your _posts directory. Go ahead and edit it and re-build the site to see your changes. You can rebuild the site in many different ways, but the most common way is to run jekyll serve, which launches a web server and auto-regenerates your site when a file is updated.

To add new posts, simply add a file in the _posts directory that follows the convention YYYY-MM-DD-name-of-post.ext and includes the necessary front matter. You can rebuild the site in many different ways, but the most common way is to run jekyll serve, which launches a web server and auto-regenerates your site when a file is updated.

To add new posts, simply add a file in the _posts directory that follows the convention YYYY-MM-DD-name-of-post.ext and includes the necessary front matter. Take a look at the source for this post to get an idea about how it works.is post in your _posts directory. Go ahead and edit it and re-build the site to see your changes. You can rebuild the site in many different ways, but the most common way is to run jekyll serve, which launches a web server and auto-regenerates your site when a file is updated.

To add new posts, simply add a file in the _posts directory that follows the convention YYYY-MM-DD-name-of-post.ext and includes the necessary front matter. Take a look at the source for this post to get an idea about how it works.
